creator: MoovBuddy
descriptionHtml:
RELIEVE PAIN, GET STRONGER, FEEL BETTER!

MoovBuddy will be your biggest supporter in order to get you feel physically better. It is not only exercise app, it is your motivator for being engaged to your programs. Relieve your chronic pain (upper back & lower back, neck, shoulder, knee,hip), improve your posture and get strengthen step by step. Download MoovBuddy now and enjoy doing exercises in a personalized way.

What is MoovBuddy For?

-> Relieve lower back & upper back pain and neck pain,
-> Fix your neck and shoulder posture,
-> Strengthen your muscles,
-> Improve your balance and coordination,
-> Regulate your blood flow,
-> Control your stress

Furthermore:
-> Women Health Specific Exercise Programs (PMS, Kegel ,Pilates)
-> Exercises for Office Hours (physical inactivity)
-> Exercises for Long Travels
-> Exercises for Gamers ( training, preventive exercises )

What You Will Find on MoovBuddy?

-> Exercise for Neck Pain Relief
-> Exercise for Lower and Upper Back Pain Relief
-> Exercise for Shoulder Pain Relief
-> Exercise for Knee Pain Relief
-> Exercise for Chronic Muscle Pain Relief
-> Exercise for Improving Posture and Balance (Exercises for Neck Hump)


Access Your Prescribed Programs

MoovBuddy provide a functional platform for you and your health care professional. You can access your health care professional’s program with a code via MoovBuddy. Thanks to our tabulation system on MoovBuddy, your health care professional can make observations about your improvement status from exercise completion chart, pain status chart and functionality charts which are created according to your feedbacks given after each exercise.

WHY MoovBuddy?

1)TRUSTED and APPROVED CONTENT

MoovBuddy provides you more than 100+ special exercise programs which are created by DOCTORS and PHYSIOTHERAPISTS. Our health team prepare each program by considering specific case of related health issue.

2) DAILY REMINDERS and RECOMMENDATIONS

Key factor for the best result is performing your exercises continuously. The app reminds your exercise time. Reminders are configurable. Furthermore, MoovBuddy helps you to change wrong habits which might cause you a health problem. You might get a notification while sleeping against TV with a bad position. :)

3) FEEDBACKS and ACTIVITY HISTORY

You can see your progress in the app. Your completion, pain and functionality status recorded to let you see activity results. Feedback preferences are up to you, turn off when you don’t need to save pain level anymore. The good thing is that your doctor can also track your progress in prescribed programs.

TRY FREE MoovBuddy NOW

Try MoovBuddy for free and enjoy feeling physically better and stronger. Our app has tens of free programs for enrollment. Premium subscription lets you to access all the special programs.

descriptionHtml:
Exercise with MoovBuddy’s programs prepared by doctors and physiotherapists. Feel the change with quick-exercises, ergonomic tips, and health suggestions that we send every day! You can find special programs for back, waist, neck pain. MoovBuddy also has posture exercises, joint strengthening programs such as the knee, hip, and shoulder as well as plank exercises that you can easily do at home or in the office, and more. Download now for a unique workout experience!

What is MoovBuddy For?

✔ Relieve back and neck pain,
✔ Fix your posture,
✔ Make your muscles and joints stronger,
✔ Stride toward a healthy life

Apart from the exercises for back, neck, knee pain, and posture exercises; MoovBuddy also has specialized exercises prepared by physiotherapists.

✔ Women Health Specific Exercise Programs,
✔ Exercises for Office Hours,
✔ Exercises against Bloating and Constipation,
✔ Exercises for Gamers,
✔ Exercises Before and After Sleep,
✔ Exercises for Special Diseases such as Osteoporosis, Fibromyalgia.

WHO IS MoovBuddy FOR?

✔ People who want to protect their health,
✔ Those who want to do sports with programs prepared by doctors and physical therapy specialists,
✔ Those with low back pain, back pain, neck pain, shoulder pain, knee pain,
✔ Those who work at the desk, office, computer for a long time,
✔ Those who want to do short and effective exercises at home and office,
✔ Those who want to correct posture,
✔ Those who want to do sports at home.

Trusted and Approved Content: MoovBuddy provides more than 100+ special exercise programs that are created by DOCTORS and PHYSIOTHERAPISTS. Our health team prepares each program by considering specific cases of related issues.

Daily Reminders and Recommendations: The key factor for the best result is performing your exercises continuously. The app reminds you of exercise time. Reminders are configurable. MoovBuddy has also ergonomics and healthy lifestyle recommendations that help prevent wrong habits that affect you in a negative way. It allows you to relax your muscles and feel better without even getting up with the short exercises it sends daily.

Feedbacks and Activity History: MoovBuddy allows you to see the completion status, pain, and functionality in an easily understandable way. As you improve, you can enroll in advanced programs.

Short & Efficient Exercises That Easy to Apply: Now, it is easy to exercise thanks to MoovBuddy! To exercise, getting stronger, and feeling healthy, you can make short and easy-to-apply programs that are approved by doctors at home, at work, in the office, whenever you are with your mobile devices.

Privacy Policy: https://bit.ly/2PzWRIq
Terms of Use: https://bit.ly/2Pyfaxn
Support: info@moovbuddy.com

title: MoovBuddy: Your Health Coach

container.value: Beşyol Mah. 1. İnönü Caddesi No.38/1 Küçükçekmece İstanbul, Istanbul, 34295, TR

creator: MoovBuddy
descriptionHtml:
Exercise with MoovBuddy’s personalized workouts prepared by doctors and physiotherapists. Train to fix your posture and relieve pain with quick exercises for back & neck & other body parts. Increase your fitness level with strength & stretch training. Get daily ergonomy tips & health advice & short exercises! Improve your mental health & reduce anxiety and stress with breathing exercises. Exercise with MoovBuddy to bring fitness and health to your home & office with MoovBuddy. Download now for a unique workout experience!


What can you achieve with MoovBuddy?

✔ Protect your overall health & improve your fitness level
✔ Have a healthier and correct posture
✔ Look taller & more attractive with a better posture
✔ Get more flexible & improve balance
✔ Maintain active during daytime with short and effective exercises
✔ Train with special exercises with programs prepared by doctors & physical therapists.
✔ Relieve pain in your back & neck and other body parts
✔ Reduce stress & anxiety
✔ Get motivated & save time with home workouts

What type of exercises can you find in MoovBuddy?

✔ Back & neck & other body parts pain relief exercises
✔ Posture correction (forward head & hunchback etc. ) exercises
✔ Strengthening & stretching exercises
✔ Office & home workouts
✔ Before & after sleep relaxation exercises
✔ Breathing exercises
✔ Workouts specific to women
✔ Exercises for bloating & constipation
✔ Workouts for balance & flexibility
✔ 7 & 21 days posture and abs challenge
✔ Exercises for urinary incontinence & better sexuality

How does MoovBuddy work?

Get your personalized workout program prepared according to your;

✔Fitness level
✔Gender
✔Age
✔Activity level
✔Pain status
✔Mobility level
✔Daily habits
✔Stress level
✔Sleep quality



✅ Trusted and Approved Content: MoovBuddy provides more than 250+ special exercise programs created by DOCTORS and PHYSIOTHERAPISTS. Get your personalized program according to your health & fitness level.

⏰ Daily Reminders and Recommendations: The key factor for the best result is to exercise regularly. Set specific reminders for your workout time. Receive ergonomy and health advice to form good habits. Relax and stretch your muscles with the short exercises we send. Reduce stress & anxiety with special breathing techniques.

📈 Feedbacks and Activity History: View your completion status and pain & and mobility progress. Keep track of your steps & daily amount of water & challenge completion status.

🏃🏻 Short & Efficient Exercises That Easy to Apply: Exercise with MoovBuddy’s customized workouts! Get stronger and feel better & healthy. You just need your mobile device!

Privacy Policy: https://bit.ly/2PzWRIq
Terms of Use: https://bit.ly/2Pyfaxn
Support: info@moovbuddy.com
descriptionShort: With AI powered coach, get your personalized plan, fix posture, relieve pain!
